name: Paramount Global
summary: Paramount Global is a leading American multinational mass media and entertainment conglomerate, known for its extensive portfolio of brands including CBS, Paramount Pictures, Nickelodeon, MTV, BET, and streaming platforms such as Paramount+ and Pluto TV. The company operates globally, producing and distributing premium content across film, television, and digital platforms. Founded in 1914 and headquartered in New York, Paramount Global is publicly traded on NASDAQ under the ticker PARA.
